name: New York
description: New York City, often simply called New York, is the largest city in the United States and a global hub for commerce, culture, and entertainment. Known for its iconic skyline, bustling streets, and diverse neighborhoods, NYC offers a mix of historical landmarks and modern attractions. Visitors can explore famous sites like the Statue of Liberty, Central Park, Times Square, and the Metropolitan Museum of Art. The city is also renowned for its Broadway theater scene, world-class dining, and vibrant nightlife.
